import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import 'isomorphic-unfetch' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import Layout from '../components/MyLayout' import { Container, Divider, Dropdown, Grid, Header, Image, List, Menu, Segment, } from 'semantic-ui-react'; export default class Index extends React.Component { static async getInitialProps() { // eslint-disable-next-line no-undef const res = await fetch('http://localhost:8001/update?page=1') const json = await res.json() // console.log(json.data) return { mangalist: json.data } } render() { return ( Đọc truyện online - YYtruyen.com {this.props.mangalist.length !== 0 ? this.props.mangalist.map(mangalist => (
{mangalist.novelsname}
Last chapter: {mangalist.lasterchapter}
View: {mangalist.view}
 )) : null} {/*
Truyện mới Truyện hot

Mới cập nhật

{this.props.mangalist.length !== 0 ? this.props.mangalist.map(mangalist => (
{mangalist.novelsname}
{mangalist.lasterchapter}
View: {mangalist.view}

{mangalist.des}

)) : null} Xem thêm
*/} ) } }
